Description:
Detects execution of perl using the "-e"/"-E" flags. This is could be used as a way to launch a reverse shell or execute live perl code.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Perl Inline Command Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '% -e%' and (process_path like '%\perl.exe' and original_file_name = 'perl.exe'))
